data.name: Svarog's Dream
data.detailed_description:
Follow




About the Game

Befriend or fight Gods


Old Gods are being forgotten, and they are losing their conflict with the new, One-God.
Some of the Old Slavic Gods, in their rage at mankind, have released underworld beasts to the Earth.
Other, more deceiving ones, have released a never-dying soul, who can change the written destiny.
That soul is you, be the one who will push one side to the final victory.
You will work and directly communicate with the side that you pick. Talk with Perun, Morana, Veles, or even with the One-God.
Characters are inspired by Slavic, Greek, Nordic and Christian mythology. Spend time learning from someone like Diogenes or fighting Baba Yaga, it's up to you.

Learn from and about Slavic mythology in a world where myths exist.

Level up through combat and exploration


Svarog's Dream, is a big open world, where you can:
-Solve well-thought side quests with multiple endings;
-Discover new places, gather plants and ingredients for cooking and alchemy;
-Find weapons and equip the character with some of over 500 different items;
-Level up through combat and quests and make combos from over 90 abilities from 3 different classes;
-Fight against beasts, Gods, and demigods from Slavic mythology,
and much more.

Live through different characters


Every action has a consequence in Svarog's Dream. Death is permanent.
You will jump between Underworld and Earth as a soul (Nav),
and you will return back through different characters with unique skills and talents.

The changing world around you


Different forces act on the Earth, Sky, and in the Underworld regardless of what you are doing.
As time goes by, conflicts happen, and the world is changing.


Svarog, the God, created 6 worlds and fell asleep,
while sleeping, in his dream he created the seventh world, the Earth,
once he wakes up the Earth will cease to exist.

data.short_description: Old Slavic Gods are dying in a conflict with the new God and they summoned you as their last hope. Be their doom or help them. Fight beasts, fight demigods or even fight Gods, ally with them, explore the world, die and be reborn in this unforgettable adventure.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i5-2500K 3.3GHz / AMD CPU Phenom II X4 940
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 970
  • Storage: 16 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1
  • Processor: Intel CPU Core i7 3770 3.4 GHz / AMD CPU AMD FX-8350 4 GHz
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GPU GeForce GTX 1070
  • Storage: 20 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
